facebook/CacheLib.summary: Recent activities in the CacheLib repository include a pull request to update the build-cachelib-ubuntu-22.yml file, which adds the fast float library to prevent folly from breaking.

facebook/zstd.summary: The zstd repository has seen recent activity with a pull request to fix the ZSTD_readSkippableFrame function when a NULL destination is provided, ensuring that the function behaves correctly even when the destination capacity is irrelevant.
